attributes.action: Stop destroying farmland with houses and businesses
attributes.additional_details: Foid requirments are going up and yet we keep destroying farmland for homes and bysiness. With temperature soaring & with the uk wanting to cut the carbon foot print. destroying more brown or green which will have a huge impact on this is unacceptable. Not to mention More traffic more lighting all of which will increase carbon Plus with the impact on the nhs which is at breaking point with covid to add more pressure with the impact of people mental heath due to no gree space
attributes.background: With the current climate I would recommend the stopping of building homes and businesses on farm land rund the country such as leeds and other parts of the UK. We need to use these areas for agriculture uses only

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611113
